text:
e="preserve">:"For the Japanese era from 931 through 938, see Jōhei."
was a Japanese era name (年号, "nengō", lit. year name) of the Southern Court during the Nanboku-chō period after Kōkoku and before Kentoku. This period started in December 1346 and ended in July 1370.
The monarchs during this time were and. The Northern Court pretenders in Kyoto were, and.
